attributes.action: End the war on the peaceful democratic subjects of Her Majesty the Queen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned, do solemnly swear to take up arms in defence of our freedoms and democratic way of life from Marxist Labour, it's spies, agents, servants and foreign insurgents. Under pain of death from this day fourth:

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
